Introduction

This document is purely a test case to test out HTML and PDF generation and style.

This is some body text. 

int main()
{
    double d = 2.345;
    return d;
}

We can count in Greek too: α, β, γ.

Try some superscrips and subscripts: x2, xi3, α2, βα, ⌊x⌋, ⌊α⌋, ⌈a⌉.
